# framr

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/framr)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=framr)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of framr is to make it easier and faster to perform common tasks associated with the [FRAM model](https://framverse.github.io/fram_doc/).

## Installation

You can install the  development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("FRAMverse/framr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(framr)
## basic example code
```
